name: MuppetDungeon
description:
Credit to https://itch.io/profile/0x72 and https://itch.io/profile/free-game-assets for the 2D assets used in the game (https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii & https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-tiny-hero-sprites-pixel-art)

In a world where an endless amount of muppets have found their way into a room full of hungry monsters, it is up to you to throw them in the relative direction of the exit.

Mechanics: Click and drag on the blue muppets to move them close to the exit before they are eaten. They can find their way out as long as they are close to the exit. P.S: try not to throw them off the edge :(
